info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 30 at 1:59PM CST until December 30 at 2:15PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN LEE...NORTHEASTERN MACON AND SOUTH CENTRAL TALLAPOOSA COUNTIES... At 158 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Liberty City, or near Notasulga, moving east at 40 mph. Golf ball sized hail was reported with this storm earlier in Tallassee. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Auburn, Tuskegee, Notasulga, Liberty City, Loachapoka, Roxana, I 85 Rest Area and Reeltown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
